author: Chirishman
body:
Bug Age: [5 Years](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/exchange/en-US/3a0e7e9c-f1ea-4324-8a17-f4c447efcbb0/some-storage-cmdlets-do-not-work-under-winpe?forum=winserverpowershell)

Steps to reproduce
------------------

[Follow this](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/winpe-adding-powershell-support-to-windows-pe)

Attempt to use:
```powershell
Clear-Disk
Format-Volume
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

Clears and or formats the disk in question

Actual behavior
---------------

`Unspecified Error 0x80004005`

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.17134.1
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   10.0.17134.1
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: Chirishman
TravisEz13
comments.body:
Please follow the instructions in the Issue template for Windows PowerShell issues:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/Windows_PowerShell.md

comments.author: Chirishman
SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @Chirishman Those cmdlets are in the `Storage` module which is not owned by the PowerShell team.  You should open the issue here: https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/295056-storage

title: Select Storage Commands Don't Work in WinPE
